Summary.p: The VanOrmans love to go camping. So cooking outdoors is one of our things. (Di doesn't like the camping, but she does like the outdoor cooking since she gets to sit back for a change.)

We especially love to do Dutch Oven cooking!
The VanOrmans have been doing it since Ransom was about 12 years old. In that time, we have gathered several award-winning recipes, and have made up several recipes of our own.
